data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Storenomorpha Simon from Vietnam (Araneae, Zodariidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grismado, Cristian J., Ramírez, Martín J. (2004): A new species of the genus Storenomorpha Simon from Vietnam (Araneae, Zodariidae). Zootaxa 453: 1-7, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157343
